manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_dayu_zhinv_reply` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `cover` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `description` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_dayu_zhinv_set` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `title` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `share_title` varchar(200) DEFAULT '', `share_desc` varchar(300) DEFAULT '', `share_url` varchar(100) DEFAULT '', `copyright` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `share_txt` varchar(500) DEFAULT '', `follow` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '关注', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
